DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the Modified High-flow nasal cannula is effective in the oxygen of the patients undergoing bronchoscopy.
DOC.brief_title: Modified HFNC Oxygen in Patients Undergoing Bronchoscopy.
DOC.criteria: Patients need to Bronchoscopy Basic Pulse Oxygen Saturation â‰¥90% Intolerance to Bronchoscopy
